channel.title: Katana Release
channel.description:
I wanted to start contributing to the progress of this community so on top of making high-poly models, i will also make them low-poly in meta too and release. So earlier i made a katana in 3ds and decided it might look good in a server. here are renders:
High-quality [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2n02ckl.png[/img]
low quality for download [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2dsmko9.png[/img]
There isn't much deatial to the low-poly one, but i think it will look cool in a server. Someone should download and take a screenie of in-game for me :)
Download [url=http://uppit.com/v/YAD169CR]Here[/url]

item.title: Katana Release
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:14, topic:293154”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=387377.msg2902427#msg2902427 date=1249603601]

Personally I think the high poly one needs to be a bit shorter XD also try messing around with the alphas and shizz on the blade to try getting a shiny effect you know?

Umm, its a katana, a katana is a long blade the asians used in ancient times for fighting. Thus, i requote from that “long blade”. There are smaller swords that are shapped
like the katana, but i cannot think of the name at the moment.

lmao i like that… the ‘asians’ =P… it was used specifically by the Japanese. Chinese had different styled weapons. and ur right, therre are smaller katanas, used by ‘ninjas’.
[/quote]
Well from what i managed to find on google was the katana came from asia. Yet that is from when i was 9, 8 years ago lol. So i probably didnt remeber correctly, thanks.[/quote]
Kiodachis

Read full topic
